stories.headline: Creating Contribution Databases: Charting Campaign Cash
stories.summary: The article discusses the methods for building databases to track campaign finances, highlighting the advantages and drawbacks of in-house versus outsourced database projects.

stories.headline: Defying Laws, Diseased Labor

stories.headline: Omaha Crime: Simplifying Incidents

stories.headline: Mapping Crimes: From Incidents to Rate
stories.summary: This piece explores how mapping crime data helps evaluate safety in neighborhoods, showing different approaches for thematic and incident-specific maps.
